articles.description: Random thoughts on season schedule
articles.content:
Now, that weve had a nights sleep to digest the Las Vegas Raiders 2022 schedule, I have some thoughts:
Start fast: 
The schedule gets tough late (more about that later), so starting fast is crucial… [+1501 chars]
